block.p: Stacy Mara Popick and Michael Howard Berlin were married Thursday at the Rockleigh (N.J.) Country Club. Rabbi Irving Spielman performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Berlin, 26, taught the third grade at the Town School in New York last year and will begin teaching the second grade in the fall. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin and received a master's degree in education from New York University. She is the daughter of Gail Popick of Summit, N.J., and Walter J. Popick of Fort Lee, N.J.

Mrs. Berlin, 26, taught the third grade at the Town School in New York last year and will begin teaching the second grade in the fall. Popick of Fort Lee, N.J.

Mr. Berlin, 27, graduated from the University of Michigan and received an M.B.A. in May from Columbia University. He is to become a sales and trading associate at Lehman Brothers, the New York investment bank, in August. He is the son of Barbara and Barry Berlin of East Hills, N.Y.
